title: Can't Disenchant Project Items
body: The FAQ for PROJECT: DISRUPTION said that after the event ended, you could disenchant extra project materials for some essence, but, just now, clicking on the project materials only gives me the option to fuse them into the items. I thought the event ended roughly 3 days ago?

replies.body: The current plan per our[ project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide is to make leftover items disenchantable.  It doesn't seem to be enabled just yet!  I don't have an eta on when that will be, but hang tight!
{{champion:240}} I do not want my lands tamed. I want them unruly and free.
